Html:
when submitting a comment to a post I get:

Bad Anti-Forgery Token

Description: An unhandled exception occurred during the execution of the current web request. Please review the stack trace for more information about the error and where it originated in the code.

Exception Details: System.Web.Mvc.HttpAntiForgeryException: Bad Anti-Forgery Token

From the Oxite.Mvc\ActionFilters\AntiForgeryAuthorizationFilter.cs

I'm using the released version of Oxite not the latest source.

Where should i look?
